original_text: And he made fifty clasps of bronze to couple the tent together that it might be a single whole.
korean_text: 놋 갈고리 쉰 개를 만들어 그 휘장을 연결하여 한 막이 되게 하고

sentences.original_text: And he made fifty clasps of bronze
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 놋으로 쉰 개의 족쇄를 만들었고

sentences.original_text: that it might be a single whole
